name: RemindMe
tagline: Simple iOS 7 Reminder App for Texting
body:
### Welcome to RemindMe
RemindMe is a useful iOS 7 reminder app that allows the user to set-up a reminder to text a contact.

### Authors and Contributors
It was originally authored by Dasmer Singh (@dasmer).

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with RemindMe? Let me know and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
